org.apache.stanbol.client.contenthub.search.model

Class SearchResultParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.stanbol.client.contenthub.search.model.SearchResultParser

  • public class SearchResultParser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains a number of utility methods for parsing both Solr Search and FeaturedSearch service responses to SolrSearchResult and FeaturedSearchResult respectively Also contains methods to transform SolrDocument to DocumentResult that it's the unit representation of a Search Result in the Stanbol Client
    Author:
    Rafa Haro
